wrong. But I don‘t concede that absolutely all humans are sinners, even in
that rather loose sense.
I have a granddaughter, whom I love. She‘s a sweet girl, but she‘s seven. By
now she must have committed quite a number of sins. I know that sometimes
she doesn‘t mind her mother very well. Sometimes she‘s mean to her baby
brother. I don‘t find any of this serious enough to deserve eternal punishment,
or even significant finite punishment. Perhaps she has committed more serious
